title: ENERLITES Toggle Light Switch, 3-Way or Single Pole, 15A 120-277V, Grounding Screw, Residential Grade, UL Listed, 83150-W-5PCS, White (5 Pack)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #14,950 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #125 in Electrical Light Switches       #125 in Electrical Light Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Residential grade ON/OFF toggle switch with shallow body design to fit standard junction boxes; push-in and side wiring (copper only); break-off plaster ears
Made with high-quality materials; impact-resistant Polycarbonate Thermoplastic with solid steel components; frame dimensions: 4.17” H x 1.31” W x 1.50”
Suitable for houses, condos, apartments and most commercial areas that require only 15A switches such as offices, schools, stores, shops, restaurants, public facilities, and hotels
Use with ENERLITES wall plates for the best fitting and color match. Part numbers 8811-W, 8812-W, 8813-W, 8814-W or 7711 stainless steel.
15A, 120V-277V (AC), 3-Way or Single Pole. Requires hot, neutral ground wires. Wiring instructions included. UL Listed

customers_say: Customers find the toggle switch to be of good quality, easy to install, and appreciate its good value as a replacement option. They like its appearance. The functionality receives mixed feedback - while some say it works well with 14 gauge wire, others report that ten switches didn't function properly.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good quality of light switches, they look good on the wall too

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: All our light switches are old, dirty and dingy. The best way I saw to clean up the appearance was to simply replace them.  These are very easy to install.  The color is good and bright.  The value in the bulk packing makes this a great buy

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNeeded a grey 15-amp switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: During our kitchen remodel I rewired an old pull chain over the sink task lamp to a switched light next to our sink.  That circuit was a 15 amp circuit.  Our kitchen countertop outlets are grey so I wanted a matching colored switch.I like that this has a positive "click" when it's turned on/off and I used this as a single pole switch.In the picture this switch is on the right.  The switch on the left is a 20-amp switch for our garbage disposal.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Only issue I had was out of 10 only 9 worked. Other then that they seem to work fine. Good quality. No issues with them fitting in the light cover. Shipped fast. Satisfied overall

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: My father had no problem installing these, they work great!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Looks exactly like picture. Perfect for the job

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Item Originally purchased from Box Mart USA.  They didn't last but a few months.  These items should be bunded with Wego's.  I know give me the negative feedback for that one :-).  Youtube, about a dozen videos, gave me that idea.  Lastly, safety, please.  Be sure your breaker is off. I am just throwing that in.  I am disabled and my hands freeze up.  So you get the speil on safety and Wego.  Anyone can do it.Lastly, a freebie for Amazon add additional purchase, wireless volt detector.  Good job to Amazon for getting the product at the house on time.CheersElectricians Remarks Trump Any Comments Made.
